H0.text: what type of government is in north america. Constitutional Monarchy

H1.text: what type of government is in north america. Presidential Democracy

H2.text: what type of government is in north america. Parliamentary Democracy

H3.text: what type of government is in north america. federal republic

A4.text: A federal republic is a federation of states with a republic as a form of government.

A5.text: Most federal republics codify the division of powers between orders of government in a written constitutional document.
